name: Cookie Consent
description: Inform your users that you are using cookies

cookie_consent_message.label: The message shown
cookie_consent_message.info: The message shown by the plugin.
cookie_consent_message.value: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website

validation.error_message: You need to provide a message to your visitors. I.e This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website

cookie_consent_dismiss.label: Dismiss button
cookie_consent_dismiss.info: The text used on the dismiss button.

validation.error_message: You need to provide a button text. I.e Got it

cookie_consent_learnmore.label: Learn more link
cookie_consent_learnmore.info: The text shown on the link to the cookie policy.

validation.error_message: You need to provide a text on the cookie policy link. I.e More info

cookie_consent_link.label: Cookie policy link
cookie_consent_link.info: The url of your cookie policy. If its empty, the link is hidden.

cookie_consent_theme.label: Theme
cookie_consent_theme.info: The theme you wish to use.
